name: DarkBlaster
description:
DarkBlaster is Unfair.  DarkBlaster is Hard.  DarkBlaster is a Formal Challenge to all Gamers who think they are good at videogames.  The Current World Record is held by :  Boxhead Games
  • Enemy Kills  = 16; 
  • Boss Kills = 1; 
  • Health Lost = 127.22; 

If you beat this score, Screenshot your score screen or record your Gameplay and  send it to me via email or twitter.  @boxheadpixelart or boxheadpixelart@gmail.com; 

DarkBlaster is also Twin-Stick Shooter made for the cgajam. 

Use the WASD keys to Find the Boss. 

Use the Arrow Keys to kill it. 

Good Luck.
